projects.name: Product Strategy Framework
projects.impact: Adopted by 5+ product teams, improved time-to-market by 30%
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive framework for product strategy and execution.

star.situation: Product teams lacked a structured approach to strategy and execution
star.task: Create a reusable framework that guides teams through product strategy, planning, and execution
star.action: Researched best practices, interviewed 20+ product leaders, and developed a comprehensive framework with templates and guidelines
star.result: Framework adopted by 5+ product teams, reduced planning time by 40%, and improved time-to-market by 30%
